title: LeaveBuster
body: Hello, yesterday I turned off the electricity and I Leaverbuster Please could you cancel it it will not happen again.Thanks

replies.body:
Regardless of your intention, disconnecting from a match still negatively affects *everyone in the match*. This is a key reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we cannot remove or modify penalties (Leaverbuster) for any reason. Additionally, you'll never receive a Leaverbuster penalty for a single match, as it takes a trend of disconnections to occur on your account before action is taken against your account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
i guess you shouldn't have turned off the electricity. no matter what the reason, you need to play the games to get back to the normal queue
